search.query: `xd_index` sourcetype=xendesktop:*:session MachineName="$machinename$" UserName="$username$" | stats latest(UserName) AS "User Name" latest(MachineName) AS "Machine Name" latest(_time) AS CurrentTime latest(StartTime) AS StartTime latest(ClientName) AS "Client Name" latest(ClientVersion) AS "Client Version" latest(SessionKey) AS "Session Key" latest(ClientAddress) AS "Client Address" latest(CatalogName) AS "Catalog Name" latest(ControllerDNSName) AS "Controller" latest(DesktopGroupName) AS "Desktop Group" latest(DesktopKind) AS "Destktop Kind" latest(EstablishmentDuration) AS "Establishment Duration" latest(OSType) AS "OS Type" latest(SessionType) AS "Session Type" | eval "Start Time" = strftime(StartTime, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | convert timeformat="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S" mktime(StartTime) | eval SessionDuration = tostring(CurrentTime - StartTime, "duration") | table "User Name" "Machine Name" "Start Time" SessionDuration "Client Name" "Client Version" "Client Address" "Session Key" "Catalog Name" "Controller" "Desktop Group" "Desktop Kind" "Establishment Duration" "OS Type" "Session Type" | rename SessionDuration AS "Session Duration"

`xd_perfmon_index` host="$machinename$" sourcetype="PerfmonMk:Process" [search `xd_index` sourcetype="xendesktop:*:SessionProcess" host="$machinename$" | multikv | search UserName="$username$" | stats count by ProcessId | fields ProcessId | rename ProcessId AS ID_Process] | rename IO_Write_Operations/sec AS iowrite | rename IO_Read_Operations/sec AS ioread | eval iops = iowrite + ioread | stats count by _time instance %_Processor_Time Working_Set_-_Private iops ioread iowrite
timechart avg(%_Processor_Time) AS "Avg. % Processor Time" BY instance
timechart avg(Working_Set_-_Private) AS "Avg. Memory" BY instance
timechart avg(iops) AS "Avg. IOPS" by instance
stats avg(%_Processor_Time) AS "Avg. % Processor Time" avg(Working_Set_-_Private) AS "Avg. Memory" avg(iops) AS "Avg. IOPS" avg(ioread) AS "Avg. Read IO" avg(iowrite) AS "Avg. Write IO" BY instance
